sentences.english: And all bumblebees have tiny wings, relative to their body size.
sentences.chinese: 而所有的大黄蜂都只有相对其体形而言很小的翅膀。

sentences.english: The risk assessment of Vespa velutina, the Asian hornet, makes terrifying reading.
sentences.chinese: 关于绒毛黄蜂的危险评估，亚洲黄蜂是最恐怖的。

sentences.english: The risk assessment of Vespa velutina, the Asian hornet, makes terrifying reading.
sentences.chinese: 关于绒毛黄蜂的危险评估，亚洲黄蜂是最恐怖的。

sentences.english: It is real man, Optimus Prime and Bumblebee.
sentences.chinese: 擎天柱和大黄蜂是真男人。

sentences.english: Yo momma's so ugly, she looks like the elephant man chewing on a wasp.
sentences.chinese: 你妈是个丑八怪，活像个嚼咬黄蜂的大笨象。

sentences.english: Bee and wasp both sting , but they have other similarity, too.
sentences.chinese: 蜜蜂和黄蜂都螫人，但它们还有其他相似之处。

sentences.english: KATHERINA. If I be waspish, best beware my sting.
sentences.chinese: 我倘然是黄蜂，那么留心我的刺吧。

sentences.english: The Hornets will now have their correct court projection during the pre-game presentation.
sentences.chinese: 在比赛前的演示中，黄蜂现在将有正确的球场投射。

sentences.english: Because in its scramble to reach the nectar, a whole bundle of pollen-packets sticks to the wasp between its feelers.
sentences.chinese: 因为黄蜂寻找花蜜时，触角之间会粘上一小包花粉。

sentences.english: Wasps' stings are serious, as I know to my cast.
sentences.chinese: 我知道被黄蜂童了是很严重的事，因我曾身受其害门。

sentences.english: You’d wear daisies in your hair and I’d chase away the hornets.
sentences.chinese: 你在头上插满雏菊，我赶走大黄蜂。

sentences.english: A single hornet can kill 40 bees in a minute.
sentences.chinese: 一只大黄蜂在一分钟之内就能害死40只蜜蜂。

sentences.english: The Lakers were guaranteed of at least being a half-game ahead of idle New Orleans.
sentences.chinese: 同时湖人还确保领先了今天没有比赛的黄蜂半场比赛。

sentences.english: These insects belong to the order Hymenoptera , which includes wasps and bees.
sentences.chinese: 这些昆虫属于膜翅目，其中包括黄蜂和蜜蜂。

sentences.english: As bumblebees don't like pesticides, the use of chemicals has to be kept to an absolute minimum.
sentences.chinese: 黄蜂不喜欢杀虫剂，所以农药用量得控制到最低。

sentences.english: But there now are only small populations remaining in 13 states.
sentences.chinese: 不过目前，仅剩13个州还存在着数量很少的大黄蜂。

definition: horseman/cavalryman/knight (i.e. European nobility)/(Tw) bike rider (scooter, bicycle etc)
